<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H324>satraps,<s%> the <S%H5460>deputies,<s%> and the <S%H6347>governors,<s%> the <S%H148>judges,<s%> the <S%H1411>treasurers,<s%> the <S%H1884>counselors,<s%> the <S%H8614>sheriffs,<s%> and <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H7984>rulers<s%> of the <S%H4083>provinces,<s%> were gathered <S%H3673>together<s%> to the <S%H2597>dedication<s%> of the <S%H6755>image<s%> that <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> had set <S%H6966>up;<s%> and they <S%H6966>stood<s%> <S%H6903>before<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> that <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had set <S%H6966>up.<s%>

that <S%H5732>whenever<s%> you <S%H8086>hear<s%> the <S%H7032>sound<s%> of the <S%H7162>horn,<s%> <S%H4953>flute,<s%> <S%H7030>zither,<s%> <S%H5443>lyre,<s%> <S%H6460>harp,<s%> <S%H5481>pipe,<s%> and <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H2178>kinds<s%> of <S%H2170>music,<s%> you fall <S%H5308>down<s%> and <S%H5457>worship<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> <S%H6755>image<s%> that <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> has set <S%H6966>up;<s%>

<S%H6903>Therefore<s%> at that <S%H2166>time,<s%> <S%H1768>when<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H5972>peoples<s%> <S%H8086>heard<s%> the <S%H7032>sound<s%> of the <S%H7162>horn,<s%> <S%H4953>flute,<s%> <S%H7030>zither,<s%> <S%H5443>lyre,<s%> <S%H6460>harp,<s%> <S%H3606>pipe,<s%> and all <S%H2178>kinds<s%> of <S%H2170>music,<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H5972>peoples,<s%> the <S%H524>nations,<s%> and the <S%H3961>languages,<s%> fell <S%H5308>down<s%> and <S%H5457>worshiped<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> <S%H6755>image<s%> that <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> had set <S%H6966>up.<s%>

<S%H607>You,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> have <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree,<s%> that <S%H3606>every<s%> <S%H606>man<s%> that shall <S%H8086>hear<s%> the <S%H7032>sound<s%> of the <S%H7162>horn,<s%> <S%H4953>flute,<s%> <S%H7030>zither,<s%> <S%H5443>lyre,<s%> <S%H6460>harp,<s%> <S%H5481>pipe,<s%> and <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H2178>kinds<s%> of <S%H2170>music,<s%> shall fall <S%H5308>down<s%> and <S%H5457>worship<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> <S%H6755>image;<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> in his <S%H7266>rage<s%> and <S%H2528>fury<s%> <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H858>bring<s%> <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego.<s%> <S%H116>Then<s%> they <S%H858>brought<s%> <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king.<s%>

<S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H6656>them,<s%> Is it on purpose, <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego,<s%> that <S%H383>you<s%> <S%H3809>don't<s%> <S%H6399>serve<s%> my <S%H426>god,<s%> <S%H3809>nor<s%> <S%H5457>worship<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> <S%H6755>image<s%> which I have set <S%H6966>up?<s%>

<S%H3705>Now<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> you <S%H383>are<s%> <S%H6263>ready<s%> <S%H5732>whenever<s%> you <S%H8086>hear<s%> the <S%H7032>sound<s%> of the <S%H7162>horn,<s%> <S%H4953>flute,<s%> <S%H7030>zither,<s%> <S%H5443>lyre,<s%> <S%H6460>harp,<s%> <S%H5481>pipe,<s%> and <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H2178>kinds<s%> of <S%H2170>music<s%> to fall <S%H5308>down<s%> and <S%H5457>worship<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> which I have <S%H5648>made,<s%> <S%H2006>well:<s%> but if you <S%H3809>don't<s%> <S%H5457>worship,<s%> you shall be <S%H7412>cast<s%> the same <S%H8160>hour<s%> into the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of a <S%H3345>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H861>furnace;<s%> and <S%H4479>who<s%> is that <S%H426>god<s%> that shall <S%H7804>deliver<s%> you out <S%H4481>of<s%> my <S%H3028>hands?<s%>

<S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> <S%H586>we<s%> have <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H2818>need<s%> to <S%H8421>answer<s%> you <S%H5922>in<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H6600>matter.<s%>

<S%H2006>If<s%> it be <S%H426>so,<s%> our God whom <S%H586>we<s%> <S%H6399>serve<s%> <S%H383>is<s%> <S%H3202>able<s%> to <S%H7804>deliver<s%> us <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H3345>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H861>furnace;<s%> <S%H4481>and<s%> he will <S%H7804>deliver<s%> us out <S%H4481>of<s%> your <S%H3028>hand,<s%> O <S%H4430>king.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> was <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4391>full<s%> of <S%H2528>fury,<s%> and the <S%H6755>form<s%> of his <S%H600>appearance<s%> was <S%H8133>changed<s%> <S%H5922>against<s%> <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego:<s%> therefore he <S%H6032>spoke,<s%> and <S%H560>commanded<s%> that they should <S%H228>heat<s%> the <S%H861>furnace<s%> <S%H2298><s%> seven <S%H7655>times<s%> <S%H5922>more<s%> <S%H1768>than<s%> it was <S%H2370>usually<s%> <S%H228>heated.<s%>

He <S%H560>commanded<s%> <S%H2429>certain<s%> <S%H1401>mighty<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> who were in his <S%H2429>army<s%> to <S%H3729>bind<s%> <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego,<s%> and to <S%H7412>cast<s%> them into the <S%H3345>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H861>furnace.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> were <S%H3729>bound<s%> in their <S%H6361>pants,<s%> their <S%H5622>tunics,<s%> and their <S%H3737>mantles,<s%> and their other <S%H3831>garments,<s%> and were <S%H7412>cast<s%> into the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of the <S%H3345>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H861>furnace.<s%>

<S%H3606>Therefore<s%> <S%H4481>because<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H4406>commandment<s%> was <S%H2685>urgent,<s%> and the <S%H861>furnace<s%> <S%H3493>exceeding<s%> <S%H228>hot,<s%> the <S%H7631>flame<s%> of the <S%H5135>fire<s%> <S%H6992>killed<s%> <S%H479>those<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> who took <S%H5267>up<s%> <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> was <S%H8429>astonished,<s%> and rose <S%H6966>up<s%> in <S%H927>haste:<s%> he <S%H6032>spoke<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to his <S%H1907>counselors,<s%> <S%H3809>Didn't<s%> we <S%H7412>cast<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H3729>bound<s%> into the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of the <S%H5135>fire?<s%> They <S%H6032>answered<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H3330>True,<s%> O <S%H4430>king.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> came <S%H7127>near<s%> to the <S%H8651>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3345>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H861>furnace:<s%> he <S%H6032>spoke<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego,<s%> you <S%H5649>servants<s%> of the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H426>God,<s%> come <S%H5312>forth,<s%> and <S%H858>come<s%> <S%H116>here.<s%> Then <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego<s%> came <S%H5312>forth<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of the <S%H5135>fire.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6744>promoted<s%> <S%H7715>Shadrach,<s%> <S%H4336>Meshach,<s%> and <S%H5665>Abednego<s%> in the <S%H4083>province<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>
